text: ==Events== *July 22 - Fabled date of the appearance of the Pied Piper of Hamelin. *December 25 - Geoffrey Chaucer goes abroad on secret state business in the company of Sir John Burley. ==Births== *Gihwa, Buddhist scholar (died 1433) *Fernán Pérez de Guzmán, Spanish historian and poet (died 1458) ==Deaths== *None ==References== Literature Category:Literature by year
title: 1376 in literature
